titleStmt.title: Letter from Laura Carrie Frank Stewart to Eartha M. M. White. Novermber 17. 1931.
titleStmt.author: Laura Carrie Frank Stewart

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Earth M.M. White Collection" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: Author writes to White thanking her for her assistance to herself and her family.

objectDesc.p: A single page handwritten letter from Stewart to White written on 11/17/1931. It is written on lined notebook paper.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Collection." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

body.opener:
jacksonvillJacksonville
Nov.November 17.seventeenth, 1931.
Dear missMiss Eartha White,
body.p:
I Amam thankful for my socks
Andand Shoesshoes. Andand dress
Becausebecause I din't have a Stockingstocking
Toto my feets. I am thankful
Thatthat you are helping the unable
peoplpeople

May godGod bless you.
In Ourour preaypray Wewe Allall three
Willwill renber you.
I want mother to help you
as much as she can
Forfor your goodness to us.
